name: Ara
greetingText: I really like your name, I think it's cute. Even though i'm having a hard time pronouncing it.
wishText: Happy Valentine's, your probably so tired right now because you've been so busy this past few days so i'll just make this short so you could already take some rest. I think i like like you already, i know it hasn't been long since we've known each other but what could i do, ikaw na yan eh.
